creator: Raiffeisen Bank Aval
descriptionHtml:
Raiffeisen Online is a mobile application for managing your finances anywhere in the world 24/7.
Open bank accounts and deposits, view cards balance and set card limits, exchange currency, repay loans,
make safe payments and money transfers without visiting the bank.
Secure authorization, login by PIN or Touch ID. Password protected online operations, chat and phone
support. 
 
Basic features of the app:
∙ Keeping track of all your card, current, credit and deposit accounts
∙ Instant opening accounts in USD, EUR, UAH
∙ Deposit opening and replenishment 
∙ Currency exchange
∙ Immediate transfers between cards and payments by IBAN
∙ Payment for utility services and mobile phones top up
∙ Creating templates for the regular payments
∙ Paying with Google Pay
∙ Fast-track credit procedure with immediate crediting to the card account (in case of personal offer).
Scheduled and early loans repayment
 
As well as:
∙ Setting individual card limits, cards blocking and unblocking 
∙ Viewing accounts statement
∙ Checking actual currency rates
∙ Detailing your income and expenses by categories
∙ Looking for the nearest branches and ATMs
 
Updated regularly. Raiffeisen Online is constantly updated with new features and services. If you have any
issues – just call 0 800 500 133, we are here to help.
NBU License No. 10 from 18.06.2018.
descriptionShort: Raiffeisen Online is a reliable financial assistant, which is always at hand!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
You can now renew your password.
How's that? If your password has expired, you can renew it instead of creating a new one.
We've updated the "Support" menu and added the phone number of our Help and Support. If you have any
issues – just call 0 800 500 133, we are here to help
We’ve fixed PUSH messages. Yes, now they are working for sure.
Fixed other minor bugs.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Added dark theme. Go to Smartphone settings – Screen – Dark theme.
You can now check credit card grace period and minimum payment from the app.
Where to find? Go to Credit card – Details – Grace period and minimum payment.
Old bugs fixed, if you have any issues – just call 0 800 500 133, we are here to help.

descriptionShort: Raiffeisen Online is a reliable financial assistant, which is always at hand!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
What’s new in this update?
TERM DEPOSITS
One can now open and top up their term deposits. Open term deposit via app to have an
increased interest rate.
MONTHLY BUDGET PLANNING
Simply set up the goals and Raiffeisen Online will help to achieve them.
OTHER CHANGES
Automatic confirmation of payments after entering one-time password. Minor
bugs fixed and updated app design a bit.
If you have any issues – just call 0 800 500 133

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Bank ID NBU
Raif joined the BankID system of the NBU. Now you can get convenient and secure access to
various governmental and commercial services.

CASHBACK
0,5% bonuses for all purchases made online and via payment terminal with ’Raifcard+’.

Enable ’ЩЕ!‘ program in your profile and start earning bonuses and exchange them for
hryvnias.
OTHER CHANGES
Minor bugs fixed and app design updated. If you have any issues – just call 0 800 500 133,
we are here to help.

title: Raiffeisen Online Ukraine

creator: Raiffeisen Bank Joint Stock Company
descriptionHtml:
Raiffeisen Online is a mobile application for managing your finances anywhere in the world 24/7.
Open bank accounts and deposits, view cards balance and set card limits, exchange currency, repay loans, make safe payments and money transfers without visiting the bank.

Secure authorization, login by PIN or Touch ID. Password protected online operations, chat and phone support.

Basic features of the app:
∙ Keeping track of all your card, current, credit and deposit accounts
∙ Instant opening accounts in USD, EUR, UAH
∙ Deposit opening and replenishment
∙ Currency exchange
∙ Immediate transfers between cards and payments by IBAN
∙ Utility payment services and mobile phones top up
∙ Creating templates for the regular payments
∙ Paying with Google Pay
∙ Fast-track credit procedure with immediate crediting to the card account (in case of personal offer). Scheduled and early loans repayment

As well as:
∙ Setting individual card limits, cards blocking and unblocking
∙ Viewing accounts statement
∙ Checking actual currency rates
∙ Detailing your income and expenses by categories
∙ Looking for the nearest branches and ATMs

Raiffeisen Online is regularly updated with new features and services. If you have any issues – just call 0 800 500 133, we are here to help.
NBU License No. 10 from 18.06.2018.
descriptionShort: Raiffeisen Online is a reliable financial assistant, which is always at hand!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Raiffeisen Bank Aval becomes Raiffeisen Bank. We are taking the next step into simplicity. Changing the name, we are changing for people.

We also fixed bugs and optimized the app. If you have any issues — just call 0 800 500 133, we are here to help.

descriptionShort: Raiffeisen Online is a reliable financial assistant, which is always at hand!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We make online shopping, card-to-card transfers, and PIN changes easier.

Copy the card number and CVV code directly from the app: tap on any card – "Details" menu – Card number / tap on any card – "Details" menu – CVV.

Change your PIN-code without ATM: tap on any card – "Actions" menu – Change PIN.

Also, we fixed bugs and optimized the app. If you have any issues — just call 0 800 500 133, we are here to help.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We made it easier to work with credit cards: it became more convenient to pay for credit, and the grace period is shown for all types of cards.

In the statement you will be able to see the balance after each transaction.

Also, we fixed bugs and optimized the app. If you have any issues — just call 0 800 500 133, we are here to help.

∙ Keeping track of all your card, current, credit and deposit accounts
∙ Instant opening accounts in USD, EUR, UAH
∙ Deposit opening and replenishment
∙ Currency exchange
∙ Immediate transfers between cards and payments by IBAN
∙ Utility payment services and mobile phones top up
∙ Creating templates for the regular payments
∙ Paying with Google Pay
∙ Fast-track credit procedure with immediate crediting to the card account (in case of personal offer). Scheduled and early loans repayment

As well as:
∙ Setting individual card limits, cards blocking and unblocking
∙ Viewing accounts statement
∙ Checking actual currency rates
∙ Detailing your income and expenses by categories
∙ Looking for the nearest branches and ATMs

Raiffeisen Online is regularly updated with new features and services. If you have any issues – just call 0 800 500 133, we are here to help.
NBU License No. 10 from 18.06.2018.
descriptionShort: Raiffeisen Online is a reliable financial assistant, which is always at hand!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We made it easier to work with credit cards: it became more convenient to pay for credit, and the grace period is shown for all types of cards.

In the statement you will be able to see the balance after each transaction.

Also, we fixed bugs and optimized the app. If you have any issues — just call 0 800 500 133, we are here to help.

title: Raiffeisen Online Ukraine

creator: Raiffeisen Bank Joint Stock Company
descriptionHtml:
Raiffeisen Online is a mobile application for managing your finances anywhere in the world 24/7.

Open bank accounts, deposits and credit cards, view cards balance and set card limits, exchange currency, repay loans, make safe payments and money transfers without visiting the bank.



Secure authorization, login by PIN and Fingerprint Sensor. Password protected online operations, chat and phone support.



Basic features of the app:

∙ Keeping track of all your card, current, credit and deposit accounts

∙ Instant opening accounts in USD, EUR, UAH

∙ Deposit opening and replenishment

∙ Currency exchange

∙ Immediate transfers between cards and payments by IBAN

∙ Utility payment services and mobile phones top up

∙ Creating templates for the regular payments

∙ Paying with Google Pay

∙ Credit cards opening (in case of personal offer)

∙ Fast-track credit procedure with immediate crediting to the card account (in case of personal offer)

∙ Scheduled and early loans repayment



As well as:

∙ Setting individual card limits, cards blocking and unblocking

∙ Viewing accounts statement

∙ Checking actual currency rates

∙ Detailing your income and expenses by categories

∙ Looking for the nearest branches and ATMs



Raiffeisen Online is regularly updated with new features and services.

If you have any issues — just call us, we are here to help.

Dial 0 800 500 133 within Ukraine or +38 044 354 14 34 from other countries.

Extract from the state register of banks for the right to conduct banking activities from 16.08.2021
descriptionShort: Raiffeisen Online is a reliable financial assistant, which is always at hand!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Open a credit card simply in the application if there is a personal offer.



Choose an offer and accept the terms of the card. Next, set the comfortable credit limit, sign an agreement with the bank with a one-time password, and your card will appear in Raiffeisen Online in a few minutes.



Use a credit card for online and offline purchases.



If you need bank support, we are always ready to help.



We also stabilized the operation of services and fixed bugs.

∙ Scheduled and early loans repayment



As well as:

∙ Setting individual card limits, cards blocking and unblocking

∙ Viewing accounts statement

∙ Checking actual currency rates

∙ Detailing your income and expenses by categories

∙ Looking for the nearest branches and ATMs



Raiffeisen Online is regularly updated with new features and services.

If you have any issues — just call us, we are here to help.

Dial 0 800 500 133 within Ukraine or +38 044 230 99 98 from other countries.

Extract from the state register of banks for the right to conduct banking activities from 16.08.2021
